meanings.definition: Tools, machinery, and other durable equipment.
meanings.sent1: My dad keeps his collection of hardware in the garage.
meanings.sent2: The store sells a variety of hardware for home improvement projects.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally used the hardware meant for fixing the sink to hang a picture frame!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the hardware that helped her build a successful business.
meanings.sent5: The shiny hardware gleamed in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: Physical components of a computer system.
meanings.sent1: The technician upgraded the hardware of the computer to improve its performance.
meanings.sent2: Make sure your hardware meets the system requirements for the new software.
meanings.sent3: The computer's hardware decided to throw a party while the software was away!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was the hardware that processed information like a supercomputer.
meanings.sent5: The hardware hummed softly, indicating it was ready for use.

meanings.definition: Metal fittings or fixtures used for a particular purpose.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter carefully selected the hardware for the new cabinets.
meanings.sent2: The antique dresser had intricate hardware that added to its charm.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to steal the hardware from the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: His heart was the hardware that held together the pieces of his broken past.
meanings.sent5: The hardware on the gate clanged shut, signaling the end of the day.
